mapper.sql: id, parentid, area, type, alias, target_parentid, column_name, column_data, extend1, extend2, extend3, target_design_parent_id
mapper.select: SELECT ( CASE WHEN (design.target_parentid IS NULL) THEN design."type" ELSE classify."type" END ) AS "type", design."id", design.area, design.parentid, design."alias", design.target_parentid, design."column_name", design.column_data, design.extend1 FROM target_design design LEFT JOIN target_classify classify ON design.target_parentid = classify."id" WHERE target_design_parent_id = #{targetDesignParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into target_design
id,
parentid,
area,
type,
alias,
target_parentid,
column_name,
column_data,
extend1,
extend2,
extend3,
target_design_parent_id,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update target_design
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_parentid = #{targetParentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
column_name = #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
column_data = #{columnData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extend1 = #{extend1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extend2 = #{extend2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extend3 = #{extend3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_design_parent_id = #{targetDesignParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE r AS ( SELECT * FROM target_design place WHERE id = #{targetDesignId} UNION ALL SELECT place.* FROM target_design as place, r WHERE place.parentid = r. ID ) SELECT * FROM r ORDER BY ID;
mapper.update: update target_design set parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_parentid = #{targetParentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, column_name = #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, column_data = #{columnData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extend1 = #{extend1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extend2 = #{extend2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extend3 = #{extend3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_design_parent_id = #{targetDesignParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
